rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Foyer
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that adheres to Vastu principles with a focus on the north-east direction for auspiciousness.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along the east and south facades for natural light. The room layout is designed per Vastu, with emphasis on the northeast corner for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A modern dining space adjoining the living room. Vastu principles suggest placement in the north section to promote harmony.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed in line with modern Brutalist style. Placed on the west wall per Vastu guidelines to avoid negative energy.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: Central corridor connecting rooms and leading to the central courtyard. This pathway is designed with Vastu alignment in mind.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Functional bathroom space for guests and family members. Placed to the south-west for privacy.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves and windows along one side to ensure ample natural light. Designed per Vastu, positioned in the northeast area for knowledge enhancement.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards the north following Vastu principles.
Opening leading to a central courtyard that serves as a communal open space for the joint family.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: Open central courtyard providing light and ventilation to the entire apartment. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles for energy balance.
